title: Malzahar battle boss recall animation [gameplay]
body:
I've recently noticed that the Malzahar battle boss skin recall animation no longer has the void open up beneath Malzahar when recalling.
Not sure if intentional or a bug..

replies.body:
Hey! 
100% a bug. I believe this will be fixed in 8.8. If you aren't seeing a fix once that goes live, please feel free to ping me in this thread. ^^
